experience.title: Frontend Developer
experience.description: Created responsive and dynamic Frontend of Quaffles ( and Lively app ( using React and Bootstrap, which went into production.1. Used google places API and Autocomplete widget to integrate google maps in the application and used Speech to Text API on the server-side to convert audio notes to text.2. Created real-time Chat screen’s frontend and backend using Web Socket API and added infinite scroll effect on the chat screen and other screens using Intersection Observer API.3. Setup service worker to send notifications to the users and push messages and used background sync and cache API to create an offline-first web application.4. Created animations used GSAP tweens and timelines and also used Popper.js to create tooltips.
experience.description_html: Created responsive and dynamic Frontend of Quaffles ( and Lively app ( using React and Bootstrap, which went into production.1. Used google places API and Autocomplete widget to integrate google maps in the application and used Speech to Text API on the server-side to convert audio notes to text.2. Created real-time Chat screen’s frontend and backend using Web Socket API and added infinite scroll effect on the chat screen and other screens using Intersection Observer API.3. Setup service worker to send notifications to the users and push messages and used background sync and cache API to create an offline-first web application.4. Created animations used GSAP tweens and timelines and also used Popper.js to create tooltips.

experience.title: Software Development Intern
experience.description: Played an integral role as a Frontend Developer in the MVP launch of an application to build a world-class virtual live entertainment platform.• Design the entire UI for the MVP launch using ReactJS in Typescript and Sasswith pages routed through Reach Router and extensively used Material-UI• Components and Component API to achieve the desired and Responsive Web UI.• Integrated all the UI developed with Backend making Fetch API calls toGET/POST the data and used Redux along with React Hooks to manage dataacross various components & used Formik with Yup to validate form data.• Implemented end-to-end Razorpay payment gateway where the amountchanges depending on the number of seats selected by the user in the UI andtested Razorpay Webhooks with temporary NodeJS Backend.• Used Jest Framework to write frontend tests and Framer Motion library tocreate desired Animations in the UI.
experience.description_html: Played an integral role as a Frontend Developer in the MVP launch of an application to build a world-class virtual live entertainment platform.• Design the entire UI for the MVP launch using ReactJS in Typescript and Sasswith pages routed through Reach Router and extensively used Material-UI• Components and Component API to achieve the desired and Responsive Web UI.• Integrated all the UI developed with Backend making Fetch API calls toGET/POST the data and used Redux along with React Hooks to manage dataacross various components & used Formik with Yup to validate form data.• Implemented end-to-end Razorpay payment gateway where the amountchanges depending on the number of seats selected by the user in the UI andtested Razorpay Webhooks with temporary NodeJS Backend.• Used Jest Framework to write frontend tests and Framer Motion library tocreate desired Animations in the UI.

experience.title: Secretary Basketball
experience.description: • Elected by an Electorate of over 12,000 Students to Chair the Basketball Sub-Committee• Successfully organized Inter Hostel Basketball General Championship 2019 with the participation of 22 Hostels• Efficiently resolved the Athletes concerns by communicating problems and negotiating with the Gymkhana officials• Projected and Efficiently managed the total Budget of INR 0.25 M for the year-long activities of the Sub-Committee• Initiated the first-ever Women's Basketball Workshop to increase Girls Participation and Freshers Basketball tournament• Headed first-ever recreational activity Zeal & Pomp aimed at building coordination among Inter IIT Contingent• Organized practice matches of Inter IIT Team with Air Force Basketball Team and Kolkata Basketball Club
experience.description_html: • Elected by an Electorate of over 12,000 Students to Chair the Basketball Sub-Committee• Successfully organized Inter Hostel Basketball General Championship 2019 with the participation of 22 Hostels• Efficiently resolved the Athletes concerns by communicating problems and negotiating with the Gymkhana officials• Projected and Efficiently managed the total Budget of INR 0.25 M for the year-long activities of the Sub-Committee• Initiated the first-ever Women's Basketball Workshop to increase Girls Participation and Freshers Basketball tournament• Headed first-ever recreational activity Zeal & Pomp aimed at building coordination among Inter IIT Contingent• Organized practice matches of Inter IIT Team with Air Force Basketball Team and Kolkata Basketball Club
